reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: wanted an affordable but sturdy enough product with college ruled lines that had an attractive color system that i could use for note taking in my various online courses -- and the 6-colors gives me a chance to know at a glance which notebook to look for and use quickly. There are other brands out there that are much cheaper/thinner, and i am sure there are others out there that are fancier but unnecessarily pricey. This version and brand are JUST RIGHT like in the 3-bears story. It fits my price point, basic easthetic visual needs, and I CAN WRITE FAST on this, and LOVE THE tearable pages so if i want I can put something in a binder -- but, these are thin enough (but have enough pages for taking several hours of notes) that I can also fit them into a 3-ring binder versus have to remove the pages. They also fit easily into my manilla folders where I keep extra loose leaf notes on the same topic. THESE ARE NOW MY ESSENTIAL STAPLE TO HAVE AROUND THE HOUSE FOR NOTE TAKING ANY TIME. TRY IT! YOU'LL LIKELY LIKE IT!!! This is the price-point that matches the value of this product. I would not pay higher as this is a perfect match -- and, i will keep buying these over and over again cause it works on all the points I need this package to work. Try it! You'll like it, too! Especially if you like to also write on College Ruled!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Product Has Changed My Life!
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack, 1 Subject, College Ruled Paper, 8 x 10-1/2 Inch. After buying it, I have to say that I'm impressed with its effectiveness. Overall, I would highly recommend the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack, 1 Subject, College Ruled Paper, 8 x 10-1/2 Inch for anyone looking to boost their energy levels and to look better and feel better. It's a reliable and affordable option, and I will definitely continue to use it in my daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack has been a game-changer for my note-taking needs. These notebooks, with their vibrant color assortment designs, have added a touch of creativity to my everyday routine. The 8 x 10-1/2 inch size is just perfect, offering ample space for my college-ruled notes.What sets these notebooks apart is not just their appearance but also their durability. I've been using them for a while now, and the spiral binding has held up remarkably well. No more worrying about loose pages or frayed edges.Whether it's jotting down lecture notes or brainstorming ideas, these notebooks have proven to be reliable companions. The best part is that each notebook in the pack has a unique design, adding an element of surprise every time I start a new one.In conclusion, the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack has not only met but exceeded my expectations. It's a practical and stylish choice for anyone in need of a dependable notebook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't miss at this price
reviews.reviewText: I use these for note taking at work. There's nothing special about them except they are very inexpensive when they go on sale. Or rather, they are standard quality (not cheap paper), but a great price, sold in a convenient multi-pack size, delivered to your door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value for Quality Notebooks
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this 6-pack of spiral notebooks, and I'm quite pleased with my purchase. These notebooks offer fantastic value for their quality and versatility.First and foremost, the build quality of these notebooks is impressive. The covers are sturdy and protect the pages well. I've been using these for a few weeks now, and they've held up perfectly without any signs of wear and tear. The spiral binding is robust, ensuring that pages won't come loose or get lost over time.What I love most about these notebooks is their versatility. The size is just right - not too big and not too small. Each notebook contains a generous 100 sheets, giving me plenty of space for all my notes, sketches, and ideas. The paper quality is better than I expected for the price. It handles different pens and pencils with minimal bleed-through, which is a huge plus.The spiral binding allows the notebooks to lay flat, making them perfect for note-taking during meetings or lectures. I appreciate the perforated pages, which make it easy to tear out and share notes with colleagues or friends. Plus, the customizable front cover helps me stay organized, especially when using these notebooks for various projects.For the price I paid, this 6-pack of spiral notebooks is a steal. While they may not be top-of-the-line, they are certainly more than adequate for everyday use. If you're a student, a professional, or just someone who enjoys jotting down thoughts and ideas, these notebooks offer great value for money.My only minor gripe is that the paper could be a bit thicker to accommodate heavier ink applications, but it's a minor drawback given the overall quality and affordability of this pack.In conclusion, I highly recommend this 6-pack of spiral notebooks to anyone in need of reliable and budget-friendly notebooks. They are durable, versatile, and will undoubtedly serve you well for a variety of purposes.
Buena manufactura, entrega inmediata, hojas resistentes. Cumple con los requisitos de un buen cuaderno profesional.
Son excelentes las libretas a mi parecer por su precio, me han servido y se sienten cómodas para hacer anotaciones largas y con buenos márgenes.
